channel.title: Castlewars look!
channel.description:
Well i have castle wars and ive made it a fun zone and all
but atm its for mage only
it came with the source on mage only but ive made the actual castlewars and stuff
but how do i make it so it can be melee range and mage ?
thanks to who ever helps
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ALSO: I have cw so when u go into sara portal u get teled to the waiting room.
how would i make it so it counts down from 5 mionutes then tele's you
Basically how do i make it like normal rs but instead of 20 min wait i make it 5 mins.
so every 5 mins a new game starts
thanks every 1 i will appreciate it alot
